trans-unit.source: Provides for deferred loading and relationship maintenance for the collection side of one-to-many and one-to-one relationships in a LINQ to SQL applications.
This class is used in combination with <xref:System.Data.Linq.EntityRef%601>.
The data type of the target entity.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1"></xref> class while supplying handlers for add and remove operations.
Delegate for <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1.Add(`0)"></xref>.
Delegate for <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1.Remove(`0)"></xref>.
Adds an entity.
The entity to add.
Adds a collection of entities.
The collection to be added.
Assigns an <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1"></xref> collection to another <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1"></xref> collection.
The collection to assign.
Removes all items.
Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1"></xref> contains a specific entity.
The entity.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1"></xref> contains the entity; otherwise, `false`.
Copies the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1"></xref> to an array.
The following C# sample shows one use of this method:
customer.Orders.CopyTo(orderArray,0);In Visual Basic:
The array to copy to.
The starting index in the array.
Gets the number of entities in the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1"></xref> collection.
An integer representing the number of entities.
Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.
An <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerator`1"></xref>.
Creates a new list for binding to a data source.
A new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IBindingList"></xref> for binding to a data source.
Specifies whether the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1"></xref> has loaded or assigned a value.
"Loaded" means that the data was loaded during materialization or at deferred loading.
"Assigned" means that you have manually given the data a value.
Returns true if the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1"></xref> has either loaded or assigned a value.
Returns the index of the entity.
The entity whose index is to be returned.
An integer representing the index.
Inserts an entity at an index position.
The index representing the position at which to insert the entity.
The entity to be inserted.
Specifies whether this <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1"></xref> has a deferred query that has not yet executed.
`true` if a deferred query has not yet been executed; otherwise `false`.
Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
The index of the element.
An <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1"></xref> representing the item.
Occurs when the contents of a list are changed.
Loads the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1"></xref>.
Removes an entity.
The entity to be removed.
`true` if the entity is successfully removed; otherwise, `false`.
Removes an entity at a specified index.
The index of the entity to be removed.
Sets the source of the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1"></xref>.
The source of the <xref href="System.Data.Linq.EntitySet`1"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1.IsReadOnly"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.EntitySet%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> interface.
`true` if the collection is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo(System.Array,System.Int32)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.EntitySet%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
The array to which elements of the collection are copied.
The array index at which copying begins.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.EntitySet%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
`true` if access to the collection is synchronized (thread-safe); otherwise, `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.EntitySet%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.EntitySet%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IEnumerator"></xref> object that can be used to iterate through a collection.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Add(System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.EntitySet%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
The object to add to the list.
The position into which the new element was inserted.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Contains(System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.EntitySet%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
The object to locate in the list.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is found in the <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.IndexOf(System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.EntitySet%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
The object to locate in the list.
The index of value if found in the list; otherwise, -1.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Insert(System.Int32,System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.EntitySet%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The index of the object in the list.
The object to insert into the list.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.EntitySet%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
`true` if the collection has a fixed size; otherwise `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.EntitySet%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
`true` if the collection is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Item(System.Int32)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.EntitySet%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The index at which to set or get the element.
The element at the specified index.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Collections.IList.Remove(System.Object)"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.EntitySet%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The object to remove from the list.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource.ContainsListCollection"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.EntitySet%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface.
`true` if the collection is a collection of <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> objects; otherwise `false`;
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IListSource.GetList"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Linq.EntitySet%601> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IList"></xref> that can be bound to a data source from the object.
